select MS_BASHO.MS_BASHO_ID , MS_BASHO.MS_BASHO_NO , MS_BASHO.BASHO_NAME , MS_BASHO.MS_BASHO_KUBUN_ID , MS_BASHO.DELETE_FLAG , MS_BASHO.SEND_FLAG , MS_BASHO.VESSEL_ID , MS_BASHO.DATA_NO , MS_BASHO.USER_KEY , MS_BASHO.RENEW_DATE , MS_BASHO.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_BASHO.TS , MS_BASHO_KUBUN.BASHO_KUBUN_NAME, MS_BASHO.GAICHI_FLAG
from MS_BASHO LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_BASHO_KUBUN ON MS_BASHO.MS_BASHO_KUBUN_ID = MS_BASHO_KUBUN.MS_BASHO_KUBUN_ID WHERE (MS_BASHO.DELETE_FLAG = 0 or MS_BASHO.DELETE_FLAG is NULL) AND MS_BASHO.MS_BASHO_KUBUN_ID = '10'

select MS_BASHO.MS_BASHO_ID , MS_BASHO.BASHO_NAME , MS_BASHO.MS_BASHO_KUBUN_ID , MS_BASHO.DELETE_FLAG , MS_BASHO.SEND_FLAG , MS_BASHO.VESSEL_ID , MS_BASHO.DATA_NO , MS_BASHO.USER_KEY , MS_BASHO.RENEW_DATE , MS_BASHO.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_BASHO.TS , MS_BASHO_KUBUN.BASHO_KUBUN_NAME, MS_BASHO.GAICHI_FLAG
from MS_BASHO LEFT OUTER JOIN MS_BASHO_KUBUN ON MS_BASHO.MS_BASHO_KUBUN_ID = MS_BASHO_KUBUN.MS_BASHO_KUBUN_ID WHERE (MS_BASHO.DELETE_FLAG = 0 or MS_BASHO.DELETE_FLAG is NULL)

INSERT INTO MS_BASHO ( MS_BASHO_ID , MS_BASHO_NO , BASHO_NAME , MS_BASHO_KUBUN_ID , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS, GAICHI_FLAG ) VALUES( :MS_BASHO_ID , :MS_BASHO_NO , :BASHO_NAME , :MS_BASHO_KUBUN_ID , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS, :GAICHI_FLAG )

UPDATE MS_BASHO SET MS_BASHO_NO = :MS_BASHO_NO, BASHO_NAME = :BASHO_NAME , MS_BASHO_KUBUN_ID = :MS_BASHO_KUBUN_ID , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS, GAICHI_FLAG = :GAICHI_FLAG
WHERE MS_BASHO_ID = :MS_BASHO_ID
